About us

At Zanzibar tours we specialise in creating unforgettable life experiences in the magical Island of Zanzibar. We ensure a rich journey of thrilling, adventurous, relaxing experiences. Our tours include the exploration of Stone town, Island hopping, snorkeling, swimming with Dolphins, forest discovery and lots more. Book a tour with us to experience your dream holiday today!

Testimonials

Amazing company! The staff were professional and made sure we were comfortable. They handpick unique locations and go the extra mile to ensure an unforgettable experience. Everything was well-organized, and we truly enjoyed every moment. Highly recommend!

Alice McCan

Had an absolute blast! Snorkeling and swimming with dolphins was truly life-changing. The boat ride was incredible, and the crew made everything seamless. I’ll definitely revisit for another adventure. If you are considering it—go have a blast!

James Taylor

Highly recommend! Played with the Jozani monkeys and explored Stone Town. The crew made sure everyone was having a great time—very hospitable and fun to be around. Everything was taken care of.

Emma Roberts

Wandering through Stone Town’s narrow alleys felt like stepping back in time. The spice markets, historic buildings, and friendly locals made it fascinating. Our guide shared incredible stories—Zanzibar’s culture is truly mesmerizing!

Michael Tan

Snorkeling in Zanzibar was absolutely breathtaking! Crystal-clear waters, colorful fish everywhere, and swimming with dolphins made it unforgettable. The guides were fantastic and made sure we were safe. Hands down, the best experience—I would do it again!

Lucy Green

Zanzibar was incredible! The beach was stunning with soft white sand, and our hotel was perfect—great service and super friendly staff. Amazing restaurants nearby, and snorkeling was unforgettable. Truly a dream vacation—I cannot wait to return!

George Wilson
